title: Control System Design
description: Design of control algorithms using state-space methods, microcontroller implementation of control algorithms, and laboratory projects emphasizing motion control applications.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: (ECE 2031 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or ECE 20X2 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of T) and (ECE 3550 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or ECE 3085 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or ECE 3084 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C)
